backend/main.mo: Main chat backend implementing rooms, message storage with TTL, validation, and access control plus mixins for authorization and blob storage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old message structures to new ones by adding a nonce field and mapping stored messages.
feature_evidence.json: Report documenting implemented features, affected files, related components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend files and their roles in the chat application.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app entry point and mounting root container.
frontend/REDEPLOY_TRIGGER.txt: Redeployment trigger file used to force a production rebuild without code changes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing room state, nickname, and switching between welcome and chat views with normalized room IDs.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Audio recording UI handling permissions, recording, previewing, timing, and sending audio blobs.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Full chat interface handling message input, media tools, reactions, sending with nonce deduplication, and message list rendering.
frontend/src/components/EmojiPicker.tsx: A card-based emoji picker grouped by categories that lets users select an emoji or close the picker.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with logo and an optional button for leaving a room.
frontend/src/components/MediaPicker.tsx: Provides UI to search Tenor GIFs, add custom stickers, or input URLs, with local storage and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a chat message with reactions, replies, media previews, timestamps, and actions like edit or delete.
frontend/src/components/VideoRecorder.ts: Allows users to record videos via MediaRecorder with live preview, duration limits, and send/cancel options.
frontend/src/components/VideoUploader.ts: Handles selecting, validating, previewing, and uploading a video file with progress feedback.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeScreen.ts: Landing screen enabling users to create or join rooms with nickname input and room existence checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageVisibility.ts: Tracks document visibility and returns whether the page is currently visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for room creation, room existence, and message sending with optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisualViewportOffs: Tracks Visual Viewport changes to compute keyboard offset on mobile devices.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, mobile viewport fixes, and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrapped around the root component.
frontend/src/utils/chatErrorMessages.ts: Converts backend and network errors into user-friendly, anonymized chat error messages.
frontend/src/utils/chatLayoutRegressionC: Development helper that checks chat layout components for visibility and scroll issues.
frontend/src/utils/chatOperationErrors.t: Defines a structured chat error object and helpers to create and log errors, including IC reject details.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImage.ts: Provides deprecated utilities for downloading images or blobs as PNG files using anchor-based downloads.
frontend/src/utils/downloadMedia.ts: Implements media download utilities including image-to-PNG conversion and video downloads as MP4 with optional progress.
frontend/src/utils/icRejectDetails.ts: Extracts IC reject codes/messages from nested error objects and gathers candidate error messages.
frontend/src/utils/messageNonce.ts: Generates cryptographically strong nonces with fallbacks for environments lacking crypto APIs.
frontend/src/utils/retry.ts: Provides transient error detection and an exponential backoff retry helper.
frontend/src/utils/roomId.ts: Normalizes room IDs by trimming whitespace.
frontend/src/utils/toastOnce.ts: Prevents duplicate toasts by tracking recent toast keys within a time window.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, persistence via sessionStorage, and cleanup of URL hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current issues with duplicate message sends and delete failures plus existing feature requirements for fixes.
